comment: `requests_per_second` is the default value for request throttling.
`requests_config` contains specific data for throttling endpoints/accounts.
if `account_id` is null/*/not found then the rule is global.
if `account_id` matches an account, the rule is only active for that specific account.
methods can contain all possible methods seperated by a comma.
THIS RULE IS FOR `API QA ACCOUNT`
PLEASE DONT DELETE THIS RULE, ITS USED FOR TESTING.
